title: Select Photos for a Photo Essay
description: A photographer has submitted 200 photos from an event. A photo editor must select the 10-15 best images that tell a cohesive story.

tasks.description: Review all 200 photos, giving each a preliminary rating for technical quality and emotional impact.
tasks.expected_outcome: All photos are reviewed and rated.

tasks.description: Select a short list of the 30-40 strongest images.
tasks.expected_outcome: The pool of photos is narrowed down.

tasks.description: Arrange the shortlisted photos into a sequence that creates a compelling visual narrative with a beginning, middle, and end.
tasks.expected_outcome: The final selection of photos tells a story.

tasks.description: Write a short caption for each of the final photos.
tasks.expected_outcome: All selected photos have descriptive captions.
